body.name: Prevention Daily Care Mouthwash - Gentle Hydrogen Peroxide Mouthwash Alcohol Free | 16 Oz. Soothing Mint Mouth Wash Liquid for Daily Oral Care, Bad Breath, and Teeth Whitening by PHS Brands
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 29 mins
features: Gentle Refresher – Clean, oxygenate, and soothe your gums for better-smelling breath with PHS Daily Care. Your mouthwash for bad breath cleans underneath your gums and works to remove offensive sulfur.
Strengthen Your Systems – Build a foundation for better overall wellness. Your naturally whitening mouthwash helps you control your mouth’s environment without damaging your beneficial flora.

Many Applications – Rinse away debris, microscopic organisms, bad smells, and damaged tissues. Consult with a licensed dentist before using as an oral rinse for gum disease or any other serious symptoms.
Naturally Minty – Choose a gentler dental rinse with no artificial flavors or dyes. Your alcohol free mouthwash is peroxide-based with natural peppermint oil and breath-freshening zinc chloride.
An Ounce of Prevention – Tackle a key piece of preventative care and support your wellbeing with U.S.-made solutions. Your alcohol free mouth rinse is backed by our dedication to your dental hygiene.
body.description: Optimize Your Daily Oral Care Routine Prevention Daily Care mouthwash is alcohol-free and gentle on your gums. It comes in a refreshing mint flavor that will leave your mouth feeling refreshed and rejuvenated - without any burn! Our mouthwash oxygenates your gum line to help clean those hard to reach areas and prevent gum problems. This gentle mouthwash is safe to use for all ages and is intended as an essential part of your daily oral care routine. Take the best care of your oral health with Prevention Daily Care!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars mouthwash is Alcohol Free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No Burn, No Bad Taste
reviews.reviewText: This rinse has really helped improve my overall dental health. My teeth are not as sensitive, my gum health has really improved, and for the first time, I didn't have a report of cavities. Probably because I could stand it longer. My dental health has always been less than average despite all I would do and had to have a lot of dental work done over the years. I've developed an extreme fear of the dentist sadly after some incidents, so that has also influenced my dental health.It took a long time, but I finally found a dentist and clinic that really works with me. They've rebuilt my confidence and trust little by little. Thanks to them, I have really begun to want to try and take even better care of my teeth. Finally did more extensive research after getting a little more comfortable with the subject. I came across the Bentist (his tips/advice are true because even my dentist confirmed them) and he influenced me to look into options that are better and maybe even more gentle. My gums are sensitive especially after getting oral surgery for wisdoms and deep cleaning. My dentist recommended to me a specific toothpaste and mouthwash that didn't have alcohol. So I used the non-alcoholic version of the brand I used and a few others but couldn't keep up because they tasted awful.This mouthwash came up in my searches and I read a few reviews. One said it helped their sensitivity quite a bit and another the whitening effect. I found it also had the right stuff, a bit more costly, but decided to get it. Taste isn't unbearable, it reminds me of a sugarless, flat, cream soda. It doesn't burn everything and if I do swallow some on accident, I'm not in any pain. Alcohol has never agreed with my stomach and the lingering effects of an accidental swallow of even just a couple drops of Listerine (or any with alcohol) made me ill.I can see the flavor being very bizarre for some, and honestly, it took me a day or so before I got completely used to it. Other than that, it does everything others stated and my gums are no longer inflamed. It is very soothing too and you really don't need a lot. I found around a teaspoon or so is all thats really needed. The foaming of it helps get into places I finished flossing and brushing for a more thorough clean.All in all, I would recommend this, especially for sensitivity or if you have braces. I recall having sore areas when wearing braces that made using some mouthwashes uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash is totally amazing. After the first use my tongue looked and felt so much better. I've been going thru chemotherapy treatments and my tongue has been white/ yellow and numb with everything tasting horrible. I wish I had ordered this months ago. I am so happy and thankful that I am getting relief from this. Food and drinks are starting to taste as they should and I am only on day two of using. If you are experiencing the symptoms I did do not hesitate and purchase this , you will be so glad you did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s not like magic mouth which you get by prescription… there are other OTC mouthwashes that are less expensive with same results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works really well for cuts, oral thrush, and itchy gums. My braces keep cutting the inside of my mouth and causes me to sometimes have canker sores. This helps it heal better and faster in less than a week.
